charges.charge_description: 8:1324.F BRINGING IN AND HARBORING ALIENS - 8:1324(a)(1)(A)(v)(I), (a)(1)(A)(ii), and (a)(1)(B)(i) Conspiracy to transport undocumented aliens within the United States (2/14/13)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP: 7 months, concurrent as to Counts 1, 2 and 3 for a total of 7 months; SR: 3 years with special condition of 7 months in home confinement concurrent as to Counts 1, 2 and 3 for a total of 3 years; SA: $100.00 as to each count for a total of $300.00; fine waived; 120 hours of community service to be completed within first two years of supervision.

charges.charge_description: 8:1324.F BRINGING IN AND HARBORING ALIENS - 8:1324(a)(1)(A)(ii) and (a)(1)(B)(i) Transportation of undocumented aliens within the United States (2/14/13)(2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP: 7 months, concurrent as to Counts 1, 2 and 3 for a total of 7 months; SR: 3 years with special condition of 7 months in home confinement concurrent as to Counts 1, 2 and 3 for a total of 3 years; SA: $100.00 as to each count for a total of $300.00; fine waived; 120 hours of community service to be completed within first two years of supervision.
